utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, the way you crushed Mike at ping pong was such a turn-on.You wanna...?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know, I'd love to, but I'm a little tired.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'll put a pillowcase over my head.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, okay, Mike's taking a shower, which by the way there's no law against. And then we're gonna grab some food, so if you want...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ... finally...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is that Ross?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, you can hear everything through these stupid walls.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sounds like he's with someone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He could be alone. This morning I heard him do push-ups, and then talk to his triceps.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait a minute, I think Phoebe's right. You know I hear someone else in there with him.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Ooh... Dr. Geller!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: God, you're amazing... I didn't even have to ask you to call me that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, that's Charlie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She's cheating on Joey with Ross!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that tart... floozy... giant...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm not sure about this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you're right. This is none of our business.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No I'm not sure that it's the best way to hear everything. Someone get me a glass!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm not gonna do this, okay? I'm not gonna eavesdrop on my friend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh... I loveBarbados!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh... I can't believe I'm kissing you. I'm kissing Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I'm her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel and Joey! It's Rachel and Joey!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get over here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ooh...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, I love how thin these walls are!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, you know, before you said that nothing could happen between us? What changed?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I only said that because of Ross, you know. Then I saw him kissing Charlie...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Ross and Charlie? Wow! She's really making her way through the group, huh? Ah, who am I to talk?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe this. Rachel and Joey?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How about the dinosaur twins in the other room? No-one is manning that wall!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm on it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Anything?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think I hear curtains closing...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We've got shoes being kicked off over here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bedsprings, unmistakable!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You do realise that's your brother?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not until you said it. Somebody switch! Wait a minute... Ross and Charlie, Joey and Rachel, Phoebe and Mike! We're the only people leaving with the same person we came with.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's not true. I came with Monica and I'm leaving with Weird Al.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I've had it with the hair jokes. Tomorrow morning, before we leave, I'm going to the salon.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay Buckwheat!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You gotta hear this, it's great... It's like free porn!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Weh...*sigh*

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: uhm... Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, It's just... I don't think I can do this...

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Ooh... Is it because of what might be on the bedspread, because I saw that news report too, with the infra red and the ... I could just...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, NO! Look, I need to talk to Joey. I mean, you guys just broke up. Before anything more happens between us, I need to know he's okay with it.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I uhm... I completely understand.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Alright, I'm gonna go find them... I just need a... need a before I can... you know. Grandma... grandma... grandma... Okay, I see you later.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Okay...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's the door. He's gone...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And she's... turning on the TV... and watching... Miss Congeniality!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, if you know it through a wall, you know it too well!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what are you guys doing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, we're just... we're sad to go so we're just saying goodbye to the hotel. I love you... Paradise Hotel, Golf resort and Spa...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we had a great time, thank you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, uhm... Hey, you guys seen Joey anywhere?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He's probably in his room with his current girlfriend Charlie. That's the situation as we know it...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, if you see him could you please tell him I'm looking for him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You got it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Other wall, people! Other wall!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, you there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God, it's Ross. What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, ju-ju-just stay calm. Just be calm. For all he knows we're just hanging out together. Right? Just be nonchalant. That's not nonchalant!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No idea what it means.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... okay, just hide!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Coming! Try under the bed, try under the bed!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: There's no room under the bed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know where Joey is?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ...I really don't...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can I talk to you for a minute?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, sure...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't believe this... Have you guys been...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Shhh... This is the listening side of the wall.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And then she told me that she and Joey had broken up, and that part of the reason was that she had feelings for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh... right... yeah...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And you know I wanted to ask Charlie out since the day I met her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I know... I know it's been really hard for you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyway, one thing lead to another, and... oh... before you know it, we were kissing. I mean, how angry do you think Joey is gonna be?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is hard to say, Ross. That is hard to say.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, I gotta go find him. He's gotta be here someplace.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You would think!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is he gone?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How are you doing this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pssst...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How... wha... Hey! What are you... What is this? Have you guys been listening this entire time?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now, what is this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah, what is this? Well, lets see, we kissed for ten minutes and now we're talking to our friends about it, so I guess this is sixth grade!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no... Have you thought about it how complicated this could get? What about Ross?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, he's with Charlie now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, but he wants to talk to you before anything really happens with her. And as his friend, I mean, don't you think he deserves the same from you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're a pain in my ass, Geller!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, look you guys... Look, we appreciate all the advice, but this is between Joey and me and I think we can handle it...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, well we'll go back in there, but will you do one thing for us? The people that care about you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Enunciate!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Get out!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are they right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Probably, yeah... I mean, maybe we should... hold off until we talk to Ross.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah... Yeah, we can wait, we don't have to do anything tonight.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I think that'd be best... So, so I'm gonna... I'm gonna take off...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Although...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like although!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean, you know... Ross and I haven't dated in like... six years...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Six years? Wow... It's almost as long as highschool...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Plus, you know, he is with Charlie now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Absolutely! He's not thinking about you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm thinking about you...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Let's forget about Ross...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Forgotten.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nothing... It's really... It's nothing... Come here, come here...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sorry, I just uhm... I can't seem to get Ross out of my head...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, maybe I can help.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah... we really need to talk to Ross...

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: Yeah

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You guys ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not quite. Monica's still at the salon, and I'm just finishing packing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude! You're not taking your Bible?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're not supposed to take that. Besides, it's a New Testament, what are you gonna do with it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Learn about Jesus...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: So, did you talk to Joey?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, no... no. I couldn't find him. I'm just gonna talk to him on the plane.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah, sounds like a good idea... Dr. Geller!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: PHD

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're filthy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, have you guys seen Monica?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, actually I think she went to the salon.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, oh, she went to the salon alright...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Check it out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who's day just got better? CHANDLER!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!... aaaaaahhhh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think.... I think I can see your scalp.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't you just love it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ye... Yeah... Yeah... You got shellfish in your head.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: It's so... something... You go girlfriend!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You've never said that in your life, have you?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Not once.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I thought so.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And listen to this...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What d'ya know... It's a treat for the eyes and the ears.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoo, whoo. Wow, it's uhm... kinda weird that I'm sitting next to Charlie after we broke up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, it's almost if Air Barbados doesn't care about your social life.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, does someone mind switching to sit with Charlie?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I uh, I mean, I... dude, I spent the whole conference with Charlie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I understand...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I'll do it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wish I could switch with someone. I really don't wanna sit with Allen Iverson over there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhm... You know, once we're in the air and the captain turns off the seatbelt sign... you feel free to roam about my cabin...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You should be careful when checking your overhead bins, 'cause items may shift during...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aaah... you're not good at this...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You don't have to go home tonight, do you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I think I can come over. It's Saturday, right?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Uhm... I can't do anything tonight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I have a date.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You have a... You have a date? With who?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, it's... my girlfriend.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You have... have a girlfriend?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yeah... Well, when... you and I broke up I started seeing someone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For how long?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Three months.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Three months? Okay... This is probably none of my business, but uhm, how long do you think you're gonna keep seeing her?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I'll tell her that it's over tonight at dinner. I promise.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay... good. You do that. And then when you get home, maybe there'll be a special delivery package waiting for you.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Maybe I'll sign for it. Tear it open. Pull out the packing material...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know what, we're gonna have sex. Let's just leave it there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right, I'm gonna go talk to Joey. I think this is the right time. He's always in a good mood after the flight attendant says "duty free".

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Okay... Good luck.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross is coming over. I think now would be a really good time to talk to him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess so. I'm just... really nervous.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well keep in mind that by the time you're done, they'll probably be serving dinner.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Still nervous?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm gonna get the lasagna.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Rach...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you mind if I sit here for a sec.?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah sure! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, I uhm... kinda need to talk to you about Charlie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, last night after you guys broke up... so sorry to hear about that, by the way... Well, Charlie and I were talking, and..., well...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You kissed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha... What? What would give you that idea?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I saw you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, we kissed, but... nothing else... nothing else happened, okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, Ross, Ross... It's okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's okay. You know, I totally understand, alright? You guys, make way more sense than her and I ever did, you know. And... I want you to be happy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah... Now I have something...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am speachless... I mean the fact that you would put my happiness first like that. I mean, you're an incredible friend, you know that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh... uh... look... before you...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I mean it. You are so loyal man, and selfless, and generous...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I am those things, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what? I know Chandler longer, so I always think of him as my best friend, but now... I may have to rethink some stuff...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, if there is ever, anything I can do for you...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't think of anything.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you eh, you talked to Joey?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah, yeah. We had a really good talk.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! That's great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, so everything's okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, no, it's great. It's great. He is... He is an amazing guy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah... Well, obviously I think so too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I'm so excited about this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Excited?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you kidding? I have had some very dirty dreams about this...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excuse me! You didn't tell him, did you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I couldn't. He was saying all these really nice things about me. I didn't want him to get mad and take 'em all back. I'm on a edge on Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God! Alright, fine. You know what Joey, forget it. When we go back to New York, I will tell him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you. Yeah, I appreciate that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, Mike's place.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey, it's Mike.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, that was fast.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, err... no, she's not here yet. You know, I think I'm just gonna take off and break up with her over the phone...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you can't do that! Oh, come on Mike, strap on a pair.Why don't you just tell her that we got back together. You know, women appreciate honesty. We also appreciate gentle spanking once in a while. Just F.Y.I.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: One more thing... There... might be a picture of Precious on my coffee table.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Her name is Precious? Is she a purebreed or did you pick her up at the pound?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Anyway, I just wanna give you a heads up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, oh and you know, if she gets upset, just scratch her tummy and give her a liver snout.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: Hi, I'm Precious, who are you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I... I'm Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: Phoebe? Mike's ex-girlfriend Phoebe, the love of his life? That Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Enchanté

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I can't wait for everyone at work to see these... Ow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You go back to work tomorrow night, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So if you want people to see them, then by definition you're not having them taken out... say, at the break of dawn?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if I had them taken out, then I wouldn't be able to do this. You like that, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you singing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's "Bolero" from "10".

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's "Ride of the Valkyries" from "Apocalypse Now"... See, here's the thing: The corn rose were really a solution to your frizzy hair problem. And now that we're home, we don't have that problem anymore, so if you think about it... I hate them!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You what? You said you liked them.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did I? Let's refresh. I believe what I said was that I could see your scalp.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine, so you don't like them. Everybody else does.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again, let's journey back... As I recall what Rachel said, was she had never notice the shape of your skull before. And Joey... Well, Joey didn't realise that there was anything different.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what? I don't care. I like it like this, and I'm gonna keep it. You're just jealous because your hair can't do this... OUCH!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hit yourself in the tooth?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And the eye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi... There she is. Hi Emma. Oh my God, I missed you. Oh Emma, I missed you so much. Hey... Did you have a good time with grandma Green? Huh? Did she give you a bottle of anti-depressants again to use as a rattle?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That was one time, Ross, and they were only like 5 milligrams.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ooh hey, Emma, daddy has some presents for you okay? Okay? I want you to wait right here. Come here sweetie.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aaah... Ross, actually there's something that I really need to talk to you about.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, shoot!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, uhm... alright, here's the deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OH NO!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, major shampoo explosion!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, look Ross, this really isn't easy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, it's all over everything. Why? Why me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because you took three hundred bottles of shampoo?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. You were saying?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, yeah... Okay, look it's about me and...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, not another one! Oh my G... And this is moisturiser. It's even harder to clean! Why? Why do bad things happen to good people?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! Well, clearly this is not a good time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Duh, you think?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, bye. Alright, so Mike's on his way over. See, you thought you guys were meeting here, and he thought you were meeting at the restaurant, so you know... Doesn't really matter who's right or wrong. Point is... I'm gonna take off.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: I'm not letting you leave until you tell me what's going on here. I mean, are you guys getting back together or something?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright... Susie, can I call you Susie?

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: My name is Precious.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I can't say that. uhm... Susie, I'm gonna be straight with you... Mike and I are back together... and uhm... unfortunately that effectively ends your relationship with him. And he's very sorry about that and wishes you the best of luck in all your endeavours.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: I just can't believe this... Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I don't...

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: Oh, why would he do this? I mean, what's wrong with me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing, there's nothing wrong with you.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: I mean, what the hell am I supposed to do now?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Damn it woman, pull yourself together! Have some pride, for the love of God.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, not a fan of the tough love.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: I just can't believe that Mike didn't give me any warning.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But he didn't really know, you know. He wasn't planning on coming to Barbados and proposing to me...

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: He proposed to you? This is the worst birthday ever.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, Precious... Mike's not worth this. You're an attractive, intelligent woman and let's face it, Mike's kind of a wang. I mean, he proposed to me while he was still seeing you... He was gonna break-up with you on your birthday? And, I don't like to kiss-and-tell, but he cheated on you a lot this weekend.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: Oh, my God, maybe you're right. Maybe I don't need him. I deserve to be treated with respect.

utterance.speaker: Precious
utterance.content: Screw you, Mike. You're a coward and a bastard, and I hope you rot in hell.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're welcome!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, you've been in there for a long time... Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have a problem.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? What happened?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I was dancing around, and singing "No Woman, No Cry" and I got stuck.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can't move at all?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, well, I can move...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If I untangle you, will you please get rid of the corn rose?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I guess so...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Some of these look a little frayed.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I tried to gnaw myself free.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, did you err... did you tell Ross?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I tried, but then he had a shampoo related emergency. So I guess now it's your turn again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no... I think it's better if you tell him, you know. It's easier for a woman. That way, you know, if he gets mad, all you have to do is go... I didn't mean it. I'm so so--ooory.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, 'cause that's what we do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Alright, alright, okay, uhm... How 'bout this, how about this? Tomorrow... tomorrow we'll both go and we'll tell him together.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, that sounds fair. It just means that once again we can't...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, I know..., but that's okay. I mean, we can control ourselves, we're not animals.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Of course we can wait. Alright, so I guess that means good night then?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Good night!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Goo--ood night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good night!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Seriously, good night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Stop saying good night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look what I found in the drawer... And you said I'd never wear this...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now that I untangled you, how 'bout you doing a little something for me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure, what do you have in mind?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think you know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? I don't really feel like it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is what I want to do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I just don't get why you like it so much.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She's an FBI agent, posing as a beauty contestant.
